title: Allerpet Cat Dander Remover, 12 oz
feature: Removes cat dander while cleansing and conditioning skin and fur
Weekly use will significantly reduce cat dander (including Fel d1) levels in your home. In a university study, the cat dander load in homes was reduced by 50 percent with weekly use of Allerpet
Non-toxic, non-oily, fragrance-free formulation is safe for all cats and kittens over 10 weeks
Allerpet Cat Dander Remover is a damp wipe and conditioner, not a shampoo
Help For People With Cat Allergies
description: Allerpet Cat Dander Remover helps remove cat dander and softens your pet's skin so less dander is produced. Best of all, dander levels will drop significantly with regular, weekly use of this moisturizing allergen cleanser and pet-friendly fur and skin conditioner. Allerpet Cat Dander Remover is specially formulated for all breeds of cats, and it has helped thousands of cat owners and their allergic family members reduce contact with cat dander. That’s why Allerpet has been recommended by veterinarians and allergists nationwide since 1988. Cats will also love the special attention they get as you gently apply Allerpet For Cats. 12-oz. bottle with flip-top cap and pour spout.
